fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Is it normal for members of the legislature to vote with other members of their party on important bills?

fxInfo_responses.value: Not really. Many members are elected as independents and party discipline is very weak.
More often than not. Members are more likely to vote with their parties than against them, but defections are common.
Mostly. Members vote with their parties most of the time.
Yes, absolutely. Members vote with their parties almost all the time.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2pscohesv, *_osp, *_ord
